alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Tift; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 3:09PM EDT until June 24 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Irwin County in south central Georgia... Turner County in south central Georgia... North central Tift County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 308 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ashburn, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ashburn, Worth, Sycamore, Rebecca, Amboy, Waterloo, Sibley, Inaha, Turner Co Airport, Irwinville Airport, Dakota, Arp, Abba and Sunsweet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
